programlisting: def generate_credential_report(): """ Starts generation of a credentials report about the current account. After calling this function to generate the report, call get_credential_report to get the latest report. A new report can be generated a minimum of four hours after the last one was generated. """ try: response = iam.meta.client.generate_credential_report() logger.info("Generating credentials report for your account. " "Current state is %s.", response['State']) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't generate a credentials report for your account.") raise else: return response
